metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7951 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the Android debug bridge (aka adb) in Android 4.0.4 allows physically proximate attackers with a direct connection to the target Android device to write to arbitrary files owned by system via a .. (dot dot) in the tar archive headers.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

android-sdk-platform-23 - 6.0.1+72-5
libandroid-23-java - 6.0.1+72-5
libandroid-uiautomator-23-java - 6.0.1+72-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+72-5').
